level.heading: Unauthorized entry onto Stadium playing field prohibited. [Repealed]
Temporary Addition of Sections
level.text: For temporary (225 day) addition, see § 3 of Omnibus Sports Consolidation Act of 1994 Temporary Amendment Act of 1995 (D.C. Law 11-67, October 26, 1995, law notification 42 DCR ).

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary addition (90 days) of section, see § 3 of the Omnibus Sports Consolidation Act of 1994 Emergency Amendment Act of 1995 (D.C. Act 11-102, July 21, 1995, 42 DCR 4009).
For temporary (90 day) addition, see § 2(a) of Ballpark Public Safety Emergency Amendment Act of 2008 (D.C. Act 17-316, March 19, 2008, 55 DCR 3412).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-152, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-321.
